EXPENDITURE
ARISING OUT OF THE
TROUBLES IN THE NORTH-WEST TERRITORIES
FROM
1st JULY, 1866, TO 15th MARCH, 1866.

SUBSIDIARY STATEMENT

HUDSON BAY COMPANY'S SUPPLIES

Printed by Order of Parliament.

OTTAWA,
